LexiLoop

Instructions

This is going to be so much fun! Either enter a word in the input field and click Syllabify or click the Random Word button. Once the tracks appear down below, click any of the little squares to set up a beat pattern. You can play with any of the knobs, sliders, or switches now or later. Once you feel ready, click the purple play button to the left of the volume knob and listen to your creation come to life as an 80s synthesizer fantasy!

About

Welcome to LexiLoop! I'm excited that you're here! If you enter a word which is listed in your normal dictionary into the box below, you'll see several tracks appear to create your sequencer, aka looper! However, instead of using boring drum samples, we are using text-to-speech for each syllable! Play and reorder the syllables from your favorite words! You may notice some of the syllables may be pronounced incorrectly, but that's just part of the fun!
